ehenami machan minissunta danene nathi ekada thiyenne.nathnami me jada madhya bhawithaye waradakda thiyenne.me bhedaya mathu karanne madhaya haraha.arabiye hisa gahala damima rishanage awuradu 25 poto ekayi punchi kale poto ekayi umbaala dakala athi.paththara wala giye panchi kale poto eka.ee poto eken thamayi niwus hoti karagaththe.in passe ee siduwima mulkaragena madhya magin pracharanaya karana de thamayi apita wadi purama ismathu wela penenne.eeken wela thiyenne minissunge manasath madhya pracharanayata anuwa hadagahena eka.dan minissu adanne thamanta danena dukata shokayata neweyi.madhya thaman hadawana shoka karawana hinda.asalwasiyange pawul jiwitha kadagena watenakota danenne nathi sanwedi bawak,dukak rithikroshange pawul jiwithe kadagena watena kota danenne ee hindane.allapu gedara punchi eka badaginne adanakota ane podi eka kiyalawath hithenne nathi udawiya megateli balala hulla hulla adanne ekane.aayeth thawa monawa kiyannada machan.me athi.meka mage bilog eke posti ekakatath danna puluwan tharami digayi wage.anthimata kiyanna thiyenne dan minissunwa palanaya karanne madhyata ona widiyata kiyana ekayi.

wassa sinhala ulu wahalata wadadeyi.pupura halena akunak sithiwili gala holla damayi.sasalawa sitina mama thawa thawath sasalawa yami.akuru wisiri giyeya.wachana kalawam wiya.liyamin siti deya nowa wenayamak liyawennata yana bawa matama hange...karannata deyak natha.kalawam wu akuru walin ho liwiya yuthuya.hadawathe anduru ahu muluwala katigasi athi duka, thinthen diyakara harinnata wayam karami.namudu duka pashanibhutha wa athi seyaki..eya dinen dina, mohothen mohotha thawa thawath ghana wemin pawathiyi.eya mathulama gilabasi.mamada ee samaga gilemin sitimi..mata aaloka bindak awasiya..namuth hathpasa andakaraya mata samachchl karayi.mama nagitinnata wiriya karami.jiwithaya ma pelayi.perala jiwithaya paga damannata hakida?nidukanan wadala chathurarya sathya sihiyata nage.jiwithaya dukaki..uthpaththiya dukaki..namuth ma dan ipadi ahawaraya.enisa kese ho jiwath wiya yuthuwa atha..mama kawuluwa harimi..nilpaha mesaredda matha thada nil thith mathuweyi.kshanayen wishala wana theth pallam balaindeddima ekineka yaweyi..hil wu ahasen miduna wahi bindu indikatu men sama pasaru karagena yayi.warshawa windimi..fulskap pita pengi gosini.akuru bondawelaya.dase bondayata akuruwala bondaya kalawam weyi.jiwithayama melesa bondawi yado sithe..sithala katoraya.mama patalawi sitimi.ee patalawillema eri ,manmula wi sitimi.anantha sithiwili galaka patalum athara mata mawama mahahari atha.hudakalawa baraki...shunyathwaya wedanawaki....namuth,,,,jiwithaya dukak yayi kimata, thawamath ma diwa nonameyi.mama mawa soyagatha yuthuya..!

mema wasara awasan wimata pera yapanaye dhiwarayinata jangama shithagara 06 k labadimata katayuthu yoda athi bawa dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathi rajitha senarathna mahatha pawasayi.ehidi mema jangama shithagara sahitha wahana dhiwara thotupola wethama pamina dhiwarayage mathsya aswanna miladi ganime pahasukam sapayena bawada amathiwaraya penwa deyi.mannarama disthrikkaye da dhiwarayin sandaha da shithagara pahasukam sthapitha kirima kadinamin sidukarana athara, idiri kalaye di uthuru nangenahira palathwala dhiwara janathawa wenuwen ayis nishpadanagara labadimatath salasum kara athi bawa da amathiwaraya kiyayi.kanediyanu mulya aadhara matha dhiwara kotupala diyunu kirime wyapruthiya magin rupiyal laksha 280 ka wiyadamin mulathiw disthrik dhiwara karyalaya sanwardhanaya kirimada sidu kerunu athara karitas aayathanaye anugrahayen dhiwara karmikayan 26 denakuta ekdina dhiwara yathra 26, enjin 26 k ha dal aampanna kattala 26 k labadimada thaman sidukala bawada amathiwaraya pawasayi.me siyalu sanwardhana karyayan thulin dhiwara karmikayage sanwardhanaya menma rate sawimath kirimada aramuna bawa da amathiwaraya kiyayi..

shri lankawe pawathna nidahas madhya sanskruthiya hethu kotagena pulul madhya warthakaranayakata ida salasi thibena bawa mehidi penwa dun widesha katayuthu amathi bogollagama mahatha shri lankawa ha eksath janapadaya athara thibena digukalina dwiparshwika sabandatha mangin uruma wi thibena mithraththwaya pilibandawada karunu pahadili kale ya.thawada , janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha halluwata lak karamin , warthamana rajaye sthawaraya binda damima aramuna karagena eksath janapadaya katayuthu karana bawata pathira yana dushanamana thorathuru kerehi shri lankawe baladharin kisidu wishwasayak nothabana bawa sihipath kala bogollagama mahatha ape rate sanwardhana katayuthu wenuwen pasugiya dashaka kipaya pura eksath janapadaya laba di thibena aarthika ha deshapalanika sahaya pilibandawada pahadili kara dunne ya.el. ti. ti. ee sanwidhanaya thahanam kirima pilibandawath eksath janapadayen aarakshaka katayuthu sandaha awashya upakarana laba ganima pinisa derata athara assan thabunu giwisuma pilibandawath wiwidha ansha sambandhayen shri lankawa ha eksath janapadaya athara athi sabandathawa thahawuru kirime athi wadagathkama pilibandawath hethema mehi di awadharanaya kele ya.
